notes:
These datasets provide the delimitation of highways, feeder and farm roads in Bhutan.

The road dataset was created in 2008 by the GoB National Land Commission and obtained from the [Bhutan Geospatial Portal](http://www.geo.gov.bt/) in May 2015 and includes road surface information and road names where known.

This dataset can be complemented by the OSM dataset that includes several additional roads in the north east.
